arts.ttl: Chelsea Predicted Lineup vs. Brighton: Caicedo, Pedro to Face Former Club
arts.sum: The Blues have picked up just two Premier League wins so far this season.

arts.ttl: Revealed: Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca's frostiness with Fabian Hurzeler and how Italian loyalty, the Brighton manager's touchline antics and a Marc Cucurella hack all fuel the feud
arts.sum: It was an otherwise ordinary Thursday at Cobham as a few of us reporters took turns asking innocent enough questions of Enzo Maresca on Chelsea's impending clash with Brighton.

arts.ttl: Quadruple Brighton injury boost confirmed by Hurzeler before Chelsea trip
arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion head coach Fabian Hurzeler delivers the latest update on the fitness of his squad ahead of Saturday’s Premier League clash with Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.

arts.ttl: Chelsea looking to pull off feat last achieved under Tuchel in Brighton Premier League game
arts.sum: Chelsea could equal a feat last achieved under Thomas Tuchel when they play host to Brighton & Hove Albion in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend games predictions - Week 6
arts.sum: The Premier League is back on Saturday and Sunday after the excitement of the midweek Carabao Cup action and Ross Kilvington provides a score prediction for all 10 top-flight matches in England.

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Brighton predictions: Expect goals at Stamford Bridge
arts.sum: Neither Chelsea or Brighton have been particularly consistent this season but Ross Kilvington believes that will lead to a goal-laden clash at Stamford Bridge on Saturday
